name: Between The Times - Web Version
description:
After surviving an experiment gone wrong, our character discovers he has time powers. Another experiment is being attempted to try and recreate this outcome in a safer way. Unbeknownst to the scientist working on it, this experiment is guaranteed to go wrong and cause major damage to the surrounding area, but has driven himself mad, dedicating his life to try and solve this. You must stop him.

- This is a very early build, many aspects of the game relevant to the story are not included with this build - 

The Player's aim in this version is to just simply make their way to the end of each scene to reach the end. There is no catch, no timer and nothing to collect due to the aforementioned fact that this is an early version.

Controls

Move Left - Left Arrow key (or A)

Move Right - Right Arrow key (or D)

Jump - Up Arrow key (W is not bound to allow the player to jump)

Button Controlled Screen Progression - Left Click with the Cursor

The controls are also available to be viewed from the controls screen located on the start menu.
